item.title: Quick Java (I know I fail) question
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Newty link=topic=478595.msg3504200#msg3504200 date=1298003607]
No need to lock it, that just clutters the board. Who knows, perhaps some poor soul years from now will encounter the same problem and this thread will help him out. :o
[/quote]do you honestly think people use the search bar?[/quote]

Actually, yes, I do. Maybe if you quit posting so fucking much the searches would be a little less muddled up and people could find their answers faster. That however would be an ideal world because you post incessant posts everywhere just to increase a number and I, along with many others, are tired of it. Oh and it wouldn’t be bad that you were posting so much if you actually knew what you were talking about.

item.title: Quick Java (I know I fail) question
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Now laugh as the fail code makes it’s appearance.

class rickrolled {
	public static String effects[] = {"glow1:", "glow2:", "wave1:", "wave2:"};
	public static String txt[] = {"We're no strangers to love", "You know the rules, and so do I", "A full commiter's what I'm thinking of"};
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		for (int i = 0; i > 1; i++) {
			if (i <= 24) {
				System.out.println(""+effects[i]+""+txt[i]+"");
			} else {
				i = 1;
				return;
			}
		}
	}
}

It’s supposed to repeat the lines, however it doesn’t do anything when I run it. Where am I going wrong?
edit: nvm…

Read full topic
